entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
